title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: The bug report points out an issue with the DispatcherType value when a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(). It incorrectly returns REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
OB: The observed behavior is that when a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST, which is incorrect.
EB: The expected behavior is that after calling AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC, indicating the asynchronous nature of the dispatch operation.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set up a ServletRequestListener. 2. Trigger an AsyncContext.dispatch() operation within your servlet. 3. Observe the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest in the ServletRequestListener. It should return REQUEST when it should actually be ASYNC.
